lines.text: There was just something in the air tonight!
Lava?

"The prettiest girl in the mirror is me, but will I still be pretty when there's no one there to see?... me? I wish upon a lucky star to put a happy face on my pain, because it hurts so much to be so cold and so alone... in the... rain."
My grandmother used to say "If life gives you lemons, make lemonade!" But you can't make lemonade out of a dead dog, no matter how hard you try.
I want you to star in "Heidi".
You mean like Shirley Temple "Heidi"?
No, no. In my Heidi, see, she's all grown up. She's a fully grown woman discovering her sexuality, and she's joined the Neo-Nazi regime...
What is this title? Do the rich thing?

[in heavy German accent]
No. Do the "REICH" thing.
Do you know how almost fired you are?
You don't understand. If I use a smaller penis it would be compromising my artistic integrity.

There's the phone booth where I lost my virginity! "Memories/of the phone booths on my block." Hah-hah! There's the doughnut shop where I used to work. The owner always used to put one on his finger and wiggles his eyebrows at me. He was so twisted. Too many cruellers!
Made me a star!

What do you mean you're not coming on tour with me? I thought with the amount I was paying you I was your only patient! Come on, you have to come with me! You said I was "Borderline." I even wrote a song about it!
C'mon, suck my toes in my documentary. Nobody's done that yet!
No way...
Come on. I did that crappy movie you made me do, "Tokyo Trauma." You owe me!
Wink Martindale wants to do me in a Motel Seven!
Hey! I saw you do that, you stuck your hand down your throat and went "Bleh" when I said your show was nice!
Oh no, no, no! I'm just having a problem with my Uvula!
Your Uvula? Hey, listen, that dirty talk may work in your songs and interviews, but I'm a family man. I could've gone to Monster Trucks tonight.
Darkness I do dread/It's hard to party when you're dead.
Medusa, your show was amazing tonight. You are SO sexy!
Duh.
[after accidentally being electrocuted by onstage pyrotechnics]
Ow, even my armpit hairs are burned!
Do you know something, though? You were fabulous tonight.
Oh yes! Oh yes, yes, yes.
What, are you saying I do my best work when I'm being electrocuted?
No, but I have to be honest with you... some people are saying it was the best part of the show.
Really? Well maybe we should keep it in. But a LOT less voltage! Can you do that?

[On phone]
Well if you don't come out here and see me, I'm just going to have sex with... well, somebody, and it will be all your fault!
[Hangs up]
Hey cameraman, what's your name?
Hey, look, if he's dead then I'm gonna need a NEW boyfriend, right? You can't doodle with a dead noodle. Hah-hah!
Augh!
doo-doo-doo! He'll be back. Oh my God! Is that what Shakespeare looked like? He's a balding geek with a bad perm! I'm not doing this.

Vanna White, Ed McMahon / Nicollette Sheridan / Mary Hart, Chuck Woolery / Are as vague as they can be. / Brooke Shields, Dawber, Pam / Personality of Spam. / Christie Brinkley, Brosnan, Pierce / Bland and boring, something fierce. / Wilson Philips love to sing and / Wreck the cover of a magazine / Daniel Quayle's brain is gone. / Debbie Gibson gives good yawn. / Kelly LeBrock thinks she's great / She's just cold boogars on a paper plate. / Why they're famous we don't know, but / Paula Abdul's gotta go. / Ladies with no point of view / Fellas who don't have a clue / If they're stars, then you can do it / Just be vague, there's nothing to it. / Vague
